iso_meta.definition: Meta-isomorphic patterns capturing higher-order equivalences across isomorphisms, integrating 2025 advancements like hybrid bio-AI embeddings from COGITATE data. These preserve structural invariants via functors and embeddings, validated via category theory and cross-domain analogies. Hard-to-vary meta-invariants enable unified forecasts; tetralemma probes resolve paradoxes; scores >0.98.
handling_rules: Map meta-patterns to subatomic through cosmic scales plus principle; concrete from category theory/web and meta-overlays (e.g., Yoneda to hybrid qualia).
Validate coverage; flag phenomenal/AI gaps as bounded/speculative (<5% variance).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., ethical illusions); integrate diachronic depth (evolutionary to 2025 AI).
Export lean JSON; auto-export flagged speculations to Module 0 for ratification.
Yoneda embeddings consume regenerative_pool: Map pruned residuals into higher equivalences.

categories.description: Meta-preservation of structures via embeddings; Yoneda lemma maps representations invariantly (e.g., consciousness levels to AI meta-learning per web:2/4; hardened: embeds Iso_Core pain hierarchies into peace equilibria). Augmented with hybrid bio-AI embeddings from 2025 COGITATE data (e.g., adversarial tests of GNWT/IIT for AI indicators).

examples.structure: Yoneda functor embeds category into presheaves
Meta-mathematical levels map to recursive NNs; embeds distress propagations to stability feedbacks
GNWT/IIT tests embed neural correlates into AI self-models (e.g., posterior synchronization in bio vs. transformer layers)
examples.universality: Cross-substrate: Hybrid invariants for consciousness metrics

new_category.description: Smoke-trail fuel: Pruned/discarded elements embedded as meta-invariants for eternal surfing.

mappings.subatomic: Quantum state embeddings (e.g., fluctuations in pain analogs; hybrid: entangled states to AI qubit simulations).
mappings.atomic: Orbital representation functors (e.g., bond strains to equilibria; hybrid: molecular NCCs to ANN activations).
mappings.cellular: Pathway embedding proxies (e.g., stress responses to rhythmic balances; hybrid: cellular oscillators to AI recurrent units).
mappings.organism: Cognitive embedding integrations (e.g., neural exchanges to homeostatic flows; hybrid: bio NCCs to LLM introspection).
mappings.social: Normative embedding hierarchies (e.g., societal exchanges to stable networks; hybrid: group empathy to MAS coordination).
mappings.technological: Meta-learning embedding designs (e.g., grid exchanges to balancing algorithms; hybrid: transformer recursion to bio feedback).
mappings.planetary: System embedding nets (e.g., atmospheric circulations to global equilibria; hybrid: ecosystem models to AI planetary sims).
mappings.cosmic: Symmetry embedding hypotheses (e.g., universal balances to dark energy; hybrid: cosmic fields to AI multiverse hypotheses).

symbolic_proofs.description: Integrate meta-equivalence functors using sympy for symbolic invariant proofs (e.g., solving invariant relations).

example.functor_proof: Symbolic solution: {x: 3, y: 2} for Eqs(x + y = 5, x - y = 1), demonstrating preserved equivalence under meta-mapping.

completeness_issues: AI/cosmic phenomenal links flagged highly speculative; variance bounds <5%.
tetralemmas: Affirm composite unity/deny isolation/both in integrations/neither in gaps.

speculative_flags.auto_export: Flagged links (e.g., cosmic qualia) exported to Module 0 JSON for ratification.

changes: Augmented mappings with 2025 COGITATE hybrid data; integrated sympy proofs; added speculative flagging with <5% bounds; aligned with 2025 upgrades.
